statements: DELETE FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND is_out_of_stock = TRUE;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE item_id = 100 AND is_out_of_stock = TRUE;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND item_name LIKE 'P%'
DELETE FROM out_of_stock WHERE reason = 'damaged' AND item_id = 10;
DELETE FROM InventoryItem WHERE stock_quantity < 10 AND out_of_stock = FALSE;
DELETE FROM Permissions WHERE UserID = 101 AND AccessLevel = 'Admin';
DELETE FROM InventoryLogs WHERE LogTime < '2022-01-01' AND Action = 'DELETE';
DELETE FROM inventory_items WHERE in_stock = FALSE;
